comments:
I turned on verbose mode and had been clicking around. Saw this in my log.

java.lang.ClassCastException:

Tod, is this a stop-ship for M2?

I don't think so as this is not affecting operation of the viewer. I have put 
some protection in for it and will continue to investigate. If we are doing a 
rebuild we should include this.

Downgrading to P3 as I am having trouble replicating this. I have also 
included code that protects against this case while I am investigating this.

The issue was when you switch the mode to verbose. At that point a getParent() 
occurs on the root which is the content provider, not one of the JobInfos.

Released code to handle the root case
*** Bug 40674 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
